mapper.insert: insert into COUPON_TB(event_id, nm, ds_max_posbl_amt, use_cnd, lmtt_cnd, func, value, expi_dd) values (#{event_id}, #{nm}, #{ds_max_posbl_amt}, #{use_cnd}, #{lmtt_cnd}, #{func}, ${rate}, ${expi_dd})

insert into COUPON_TB(coupn_id, event_id, nm, ds_max_posbl_amt, use_cnd, lmtt_cnd, func, value, expi_dd) values (#{coupn_id}, #{event_id}, #{nm}, #{ds_max_posbl_amt}, #{use_cnd}, #{lmtt_cnd}, #{func}, ${rate}, ${expi_dd})
insert into USER_COUPON_TB(coupn_id, user_id, used) values ((select coupn_id from COUPON_TB where nm = #{nm}),#{user_id}, 0)
mapper.select: select u.coupn_id, u.used, event_id, nm, ds_max_posbl_amt, unit_type, use_cnd, lmtt_cnd, func, value, expi_dd from USER_COUPON_TB as u join COUPON_TB as c on user_id = #{user_id} and u.coupn_id = c.coupn_id;
